ygData.subject: Re: Psalm of Warmth
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Actually, I ve found that four barely is a good thing.  The icon for the fourth song from the last cycle disappears a moment before it reappears.  When
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 20 Jul 1999, Rokenn Swiftsong wrote:
>
> I have found with a good connection and particle density turned off I can
> weave four barely, three with ease. With particle density off though many
> songs have no visible effect (other then a screen icon), so you have to keep
> a sharp eye out for the text in the combat spam.

Actually, I've found that "four barely" is a good thing. The
icon for the fourth song from the last cycle disappears a
moment before it reappears. When it reappears, I know it's
time for me to switch to the next song.

It seems to work better when the servers are not loaded as
well. I'm going to have to do some timings in the morning.
It *seemed* everything was going more quickly, though maybe my
brain just hadn't cleared up from waking up.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
